entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding a new listener to EventPipeEventDispatcher temporarily stops emitting events for existing sessions #90052
    9.0.0
  • `UnsafeAccessor` and static classes #90048
  • F5 (Run with Debugging) for Blazor and .NET MAUI and mobile SDKs #90045
  • [browser][MT] legacy JS interop needs GC boundaries on main thread too #90044
    8.0.0
  • ManagedToUnmanaged stubs always pin the GetPinnableReference as `void*`, which might not be castable to TNative #90042
  • Error: The type initializer for 'Microsoft.DotNet.XHarness.TestRunners.Common.ApplicationOptions' threw an exception. #90040
  • MethodInvoker synthesizes arguments not provided? #90039
  • `UnsafeAccessor` and structs with no parameterless constructor #90038
  • WebToolsException when using hot reload to apply change to Blazor WebAssembly app #90037
    8.0.0
  • Feature switch with ILLink substitution does not always trim branches #90034
  • [mono][iOS] AOT fails for CommunityToolkit.WinUI.UI.dll #90032
  • It's slow to add rows to Bound DataTable. #90029
    Future
  • Locking on `Console.Error` #90027
  • [mono][ios] Enable aggressive trimming for functional tests with Mono #90025
    9.0.0
  • LDAP works but after 5 minutes queries throw "The LDAP server is unavailable " #90024
  • Deserializing DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames from a JSON configuration file causes "ArgumentException: Length of the array must be 13" despite correct input #90022
  • nativeruntimeeventsource test fails due to missing metadata #90021
    9.0.0
  • Crash in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn4.0.Tests.WorkItemExecution #90019
    8.0.0
  • [Blazor] Custom ICU loading from runtime path #90018
    8.0.0
  • cmove is not emitted for a simple expression #90017
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 preview 7's illink runs with preview 6 if preview 6 is installed #90015
  • [mono][ios] Eventpipe gcdump test failing on apple mobile platforms #90012
    9.0.0
  • we are embeding mono with ue how can we disable reload satellite assembly(*.resource.dll)? #90010
  • Could not find core Assembly in MetadataLoadContext #90009
  • `Array.Copy` is slower than `Span.CopyTo` #90003
  • Delete Microsoft.NetCore.Platforms projects when consuming an .NET 8 RC1 SDK #90000
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Don't call `ROS<char>.ToString` when calling method with overload that takes `ROS<char>` #89996
  • CheckProjects test failing #89993
    8.0.0
  • `NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces()` doesn't list disabled adapters on Windows #89990
    Future

Closed

  • Data Corruption With Ref Locals, Punning, and Pinned Object Heap #76929
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add variation of TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones() not sorted on DisplayName #88691
    8.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo.Utc can no longer be used for reliable comparison to detect Utc #90046
    Future
  • [HttpRequestError] Detect NameResolutionError more reliably #89096
    8.0.0
  • Detect name resolution errors in QuicConnection.ConnectAsync #89095
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests #82266
    8.0.0
  • HttpListener on linux vulnerability #89983
    8.0.0
  • System.Tests.AppDomainTests.MonitoringIsEnabled - Assert.InRange - on NativeAOT arm64 #75302
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for options for build improvements #50287
    8.0.0
  • [Android][Test] Failed to install mobile app #89567
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileInfo_SymbolicLinks.CreateSymbolicLink_PathToTarget_RelativeToLinkPath #74320
    8.0.0
  • Assert for tiered compilation bg work available event #89749
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT on Graviton2 As `armv8.2-a` Fails to Execute #89937
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 26 Regressions on 5/2/2023 9:04:55 PM #85989
    8.0.0
  • Increased variance in some benchmark tests #87324
    8.0.0
  • Runtime Fatal Error / Stack Overflow when using Static Abstract Interface DIMs with Structs #85386
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToNonWasmPageComeBackAndHitAgain` gets stuck #87155
    8.0.0
  • Fatal error related to static abstract interface methods on structs. #79968
    8.0.0
  • Issue with static abstract in interfaces #87248
    8.0.0
  • Incorrect codegen for PermuteVar32x16x2 #90001
    8.0.0
  • AF: System.RuntimeType.CheckValue trying to reflection invoke method with equivalent types #73103
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable `System.Linq.Expressions` tests on iOS-like platforms #89168
    8.0.0
  • Substitute of obsolete 'JsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreNullValues' about Deserialization of json property with null value #90007
  • [API Proposal]: Extend `JsonIgnoreCondition` with `WhenReadingNull` #90011
  • Build race condition in Microsoft.NET.WebAssembly.Webcil.dll #89987
  • Heap corruption on .NET Tiered Compilation Worker thread detected with mcheck (Ubuntu 18.0.4 .NET 6 (and 7) #83445
    8.0.0
  • NU5129 warning for System.Resources.Extensions package #89208
    8.0.0
  • `potentialMatchingInterfaces != 0` assertion when compiling comparers #89918
  • P/Invoke calls terminate application after unmanaged library modification (macOS, Arm64) #83774
    8.0.0
  • Interop Generators don't warn when CountElementName for parameter array is an out parameter #87081
    8.0.0
  • PublishAot should respect DebugSymbols/DebugType #88780
  • Regression in IfStatements.IfStatements #79101
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][eat] System.Diagnostics trimming out DebuggerTypeProxyAttribute. #57588
    8.0.0
  • [WASM][AOT] Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class.c:2006, condition `<disabled>' not met #59471
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] SIMD+AOT tests in Wasm.Build.Tests failing with V8, and nodejs #75044
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Link all the documentation on wasm in the repo, in a single top level document #76722
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Extend Vector128[_1] wasm intrinsics #70199
    8.0.0
  • [Design] .NET metrics naming standard #88515
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • proof of concept #90058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GetUnmanagedValues[Source|Destination] by marshal direction, not stub direction #90057
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Use bidirectional marshallers for elements. #90056
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Do not suppress inlining of random threadstatics #90055
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make [In] the default for blittable arrays that are pinned #90054
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix deadlock in EventPipeEventDispatcher #90053
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM64 vector right-shift must dead-code eliminate if the constant is zero. #90051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not generate internal archives #90050
    area-Setup
  • Put HasNativeCodeReJITAware into GetFunctionAddress #90049
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Reserve FOH segments in ExecutionAllocator and properly report them to debugger #90047
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add g_GCShadowEnd to JIT_WriteBarrier_Table #90036
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check for <framework_name>.deps.json when enumerationg framework paths #90035
    area-Host
  • Recover some lost EH performance on Unix amd64 #90033
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Support debug inline array #90026
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Fix Vector<T>.IsSupported intrinsic #90023
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add units to http.client.active_requests & http.client.open_connections #90020
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add JsonSerializerOptions.MakeReadOnly(bool) overload. #90013
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] make sure to only enable changes meant for DATAS when it's on #90008
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add `JsonNode.ParseAsync` public API #90006
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement calendar data #90004
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [mono] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsics on amd64 #89997
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove spurious assertion check causing .NET Core crashes #89986
    area-System.Text.Encoding

Merged

  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make sure all new GCDacVars are reported only for v2 #90043
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete dangling thread session states #89955
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Introducing TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones(bool skipSorting) #89985
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime
  • Improve reliability of HttpRequestError.NameResolutionError #89948
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Fix HttpListener path parsing for trailing % #90028
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Restore CORINFO_CALL_INFO stub lookup correctly #90016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Disable MonitoringIsEnabled with issue 75302 (#75306)" #89966
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] CI: Don't trigger non-wasm runtime tests when wasm-test-runner #89957
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][wbt] Split WBT classes to speed up CI job execution. #89926
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Use the same tracked contexts for event pipe and ETW in nativeaot #89902
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid extra console write for clearing on Unix #89026
    area-System.Console
  • Update the event used for the tiered compilation background thread #89972
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • use approved SocketAddress API instead of direct internal access #89841
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Fix PermuteVar32x16x2 optimization #90005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Use native arm64 aot compilers for iOS, tvOS, maccatalyst, and android where possible #89961
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Set VSTEST_TESTHOST_SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT to 2s #89862
    Servicing-approved
  • [wasm][debugger] Using "RollForward": major for BrowserDebugHost #89960
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] doc feedback #89951
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Linux ARM64 checked build asserts #89998
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add test for TypeIdentifierAttribute #89882
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement
  • Revert "For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory" #89992
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [mono][ios] Disable failing eventpipe gcdump test on apple mobile platforms #90002
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Light up for newer arm64 hardware capabilities #89991
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Move Microsoft.NET.WebAssembly.WebCil into tasks #89999
    area-Infrastructure
  • Roll Ubuntu 18.04 queue to 22.04 #89995
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Exclude NETFramework targets file during source build #89974
    area-System.Resources
  • Make ImplementsInterfaceOfSelf more precise for canonical subtypes #89969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make marshaller types specific to each scenario #89894
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Try Vector128 before Vector #89797
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Fix trimming issue in the cpuid test #89989
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't generate symbols if user doesn't want them #89840
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add diagnostic when the size of an array that is marshalled to the callee is an 'out' parameter. #89827
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Move ThrowForHR to start of NotifyForSuccessFulInvoke #89970
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Prefer vectorized ProbabilisticMap over Latin1CharSearchValues #89981
    area-System.Buffers

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2236693 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Draft] Limit length of System.Runtime.BigInteger to int.MaxValue-32 bits #84901
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Cleanup work #89976
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add extension methods for creating OptionsBuilder with ValidateOnStart support #89973
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Cleanup callee-allocated-only resources only if the call succeeds #89822
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Change generation for NonGC objects for debugger #89927
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Try to enable some JIT tests #89739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix stack overflow handling on Unix #89799
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup contents out #89971
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [iOS] Remove cmake build dependency for library mode #89869
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • Improve duplicate assembly resolving #89958
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • Support breakpoints on AVX-512 instructions #89705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve test failure messages #89967
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [wasm] Fix startup without emcc -g option #89872
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Stop skipping tests in installer pipeline on linux_x64 #89953
    area-Host
  • Inconsistent DebuggerDisplay formatting - Fix space, equal for name/value and Indirect Value #89370
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Unified to throw NotSupportedException when SendFile() for connectionless sockets #87108
    area-System.Net.Sockets, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Generate unique class name for MonoDeadLetter #89956
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] app start benchmark fix, loadBootResource fix #89857
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` calendar data #89255
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Fix host debug view not showing services before start #89610
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Improve performance in DI #89964
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Implement RandomAccess.FlushToDisk() #89100
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Add basic ICU tests #89771
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HttpClientFactory] Remove dependency on ILoggerFactory #89531
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Add additional filter capabilities to dotnet-pgo tool. #89853
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use managed NTLM/SPNEGO on Apple platforms by default #89267
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Speed up KeyAnalyzer for substring based frozen collections #89863
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Added issue 78891 regression test #89876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed Enumerator variable null check #89920
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Updated

  • ManagedZLib: Console app for profiling inflate #2368
  • ManagedZLib: Porting Deflate from C ZLib #2367

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet build fails to build project in path which contains symbolic link ($TMPDIR) on Mac. #34442
  • [.NET 8 Regression] error CS1504: Source file "<Path to XAML>" could not be opened --- Could not find file #34438

Closed

  • Use trimmed-down RID graph for .NET 8 and higher #34033

PullRequests

Created

  • Add better error messages when we can't fetch manifests #34460
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • don't copy over the .dotnet dependencies if they are already there #34459
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add back _RequiresILLinkPack override #34429
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Speed up template packing during overlay #34461
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable "portable" RID graph when targeting .NET 8 and higher #34279
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Automate the version label #34434
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rework of Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #34430
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun

Updated

  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the hard code of newtonsoft package version #34266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support Records in GenAPI #34433
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Add implementation and test for the DisableRuntimeMarshalling attribute. #34388
    untriaged
  • One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow PublishSingleFile and PublishAot specified simultaneously #34419
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add feature switch to control XmlResolver.IsNetworkingEnabledByDefault #34412
  • Add a concept of image family to container base image inference #33163
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: ref safety #7419

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CS9169 is not reported for record structs with InlineArray attribute #69402
  • Compiler crashes when emitting EnC delta for assembly with synthesized inline array types #69398
  • Onboard Roslyn options to Unified Settings #69396
    17.8 P4
  • Use background work indicator for Go To Implementation #69390
    18.0
  • Use background work indicator for Go To Definition #69389
    18.0
  • Namespace Update ignores dotnet_style_parentheses_in_other_binary_operators being set to always_for_clarity and removes parentheses anyway #69385
  • Code fix "Make method async" should have a configuration for the "Async" suffix #69384
  • Decimal constant ISymbols are IsReadOnly when read from metadata #69376

Closed

  • SyntaxGenerator will emit `MaxValue` literal when defining the `MaxValue` constant itself. #69380
  • Crashing under dotnet SDK 7.0.306 in vscode #69393
  • Crashing under dotnet SDK 7.0.306 in vscode #69394
  • Using VS2022 and C#, the XML comment element "paramref" does not work in summaries of delegate descriptions #69293
  • "Change Signature" dialog forbids void as type but allows System.Void #44959
    Backlog
  • No C# project is currently loaded #69379
  • Crashing under dotnet SDK 7.0.306 in vscode #69381
  • Crashing under dotnet SDK 7.0.306 in vscode #69382

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix analyzer conflicts on Linux #69406
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Implementation for Regex QuickInfo Provider and it includes documentation for Regular Expressions. #69405
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Move from LanguageVersion.Preview to LanguageVersionExtensions.CSharpNext #69399
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Tweak LanguageServerProjectSystem logger level for project load failures #69395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use argument validation consistently in all SourceText implementations #69391
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use CultureInfo.InvariantCulture when creating a StringWriter #69388
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use PooledStringBuilder in StringTextWriter #69386
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add LanguageVersion for C# 12 #69383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove ActiveStatementTagger #69377
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add custom project contexts endpoint #69374
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Report rude edit for InlineArrayAttribute changes #69404
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator handling of special type constants #69400
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Respect vscode codelens options to enable / disable #69352
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for converting existing collection-initializers over to collection expressions. #69321
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Log exception to EnC log #69401
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Use hint diagnostics in vscode for better rendering in the editor #69403
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for quick info in embedded languages #69303
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove sourcelink dependency #69397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix run tests on older versions of the SDK #69375
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Include paramref tags in delegate documentation #69297
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Forbid declaring parameters of `void` type in 'Change Signature'->"Add parameter" dialog #69329
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Only Left and returnValue gets checked for dynamic in signature #69214
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix misleading lsp server logs #69378
    Area-Infrastructure, LSP, untriaged, Next
  • Upgrade NuGet.Frameworks to fix loading projects with the 7.0.4xx SDK #69354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Temporarily disable navigate to tests due to queue upgrade #69365
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Extract collection-expression creation code into its own helper type. #69407
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix constraint cycle through nested type of base type #69242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline array for span argument when the argument cannot escape #69348
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: emit Array.Empty<T>() for [] with target type T[] or IEnumerable<T> #69355
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add LSP Simplify Method for Razor #69323
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Exceptions.ThrowEFail() should always be thrown. #69288
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add support for assembly/module-level `[Experimental]` and contextual suppression #69316
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve EOL consistency for Add Using #69309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Adjust OptProf config #69370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tests for #68731 #69193
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Object Favorites: Avoid name collisions on hidden properties #69349
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Fix issues where internal pattern matching state was being copied #69336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not offer 'use pattern matching' inside an expression tree #69362
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve location that lambda errors are reported at. #69334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Prototype of a public API (though currently internal) for roslyn features to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Collection expressions: use inline array for spans in local initializers and method arguments when possible #69291
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Workaround issues with Uri escaping certain Unicode characters #69304
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add assertions for length to StringTextWriter & LargeTextWriter #69369
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve the user experience of consuming Blazor component libraries #49880
  • Extended IdentityDbContext doesn't add migration he exception 'Cannot use table 'CFGPerfilClaim' for entity type 'PerfilClaim' since it is being used for entity type 'IdentityRoleClaim<int>' and potentially other entity types #49878
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #49877
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #49876
  • When razor page uses InputDate, the use of the time format is invalid. #49873
  • CORS setup not working properly with a fresh Blazor WebAssembly Hosted app #49871
  • Authentication and Authorization in Blazor Web App for .net 8 #49870
  • Selenium updates are broken #49869
  • Tool for tracking changes by Blazor #49867
  • AssemblyLoadContext not unloaded when server started and stopped #49864
  • [SignalR-Cpp-Client] Streaming support #49863

Closed

  • F# Web API template uses inconsistent tag. "WebAPI" should be "Web API." #49812
  • DOMException: Failed to execute 'removeChild' on 'Node': The node to be removed is not a child of this node. #49820
    8.0-rc1
  • AD Authentication / Authorization not working anymore in my Blazor Server App since installation of latest version #49503
  • Blazor Web App template should enable server interactivity by default #49314
    8.0-rc1
  • In .NET 8, scoped CSS from referenced Microsoft.NET.Sdk.BlazorWebAssembly project isn't included #49804
    8.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove internal archives #49879
    area-infrastructure
  • Tweak configuration of JsonSerializerOptions #49875
    area-mvc, area-minimal
  • Update NuGet #49872
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Disable CrossgenOutput for loongarch64 architecture #49862
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improve debugger display in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http #49861
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update template.json #49813
    area-mvc, 8.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `40412d8` to `455fcb7` #49866
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Update Nuget reference (by updating CodeAnalysis) #49843
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Improve auto render mode selection strategy #49858
    area-blazor
  • Rename rate limiting middleware metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49749
    area-middleware
  • Support view buffer-based rendering in Blazor #49860
    area-blazor
  • Don't pack Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Testing #49846
    area-infrastructure
  • Rename hosting, routing and error handling metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49743
    area-hosting
  • ServerSentEvents: Support CRLF + LF as line endings #49727
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2236519 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Rename SignalR transport metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49766
    area-signalr
  • Rename Kestrel metrics to be consistent with OpenTelemetry #49747
    area-runtime
  • Add a .http file to WebAPI project template #49561
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make DataProtectionKey props virtual #49604
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Release 7.0.92 rollback json refers to non exiting packages #16557
  • There should be a subscribable event for changes to the Map visible region #16556
  • Picker on Windows is endlessly Scrolling #16555
  • ProgressBar height not changing #16553
  • Custom color for selected bottom tabbar in Shell not working. #16551
  • SearchHandler in Shell on iOS Crashes #16550
  • CollectionView does not shrink correctly on Windows #16548
  • Border background is wrong by default on Android and text cannot be seen (it's correct on Windows) #16547
  • CollectionView bounces/wobbles when values are updated on Android #16546
  • Error CS0246 on iOS namespaces when using Conditional Compilation #16544
  • favicon.ico is not needed in MAUI Blazor Hybrid application #16542
  • Setting button IsEnabled to 'true' does not dynamically change background color to match dark/light theme #16538
  • ContentPage.Background (with LinearGradientBrush) not working for iOS #16537

Closed

  • Run MAUI app on M1 Mac without Rosetta 2 #4476
    .NET 8 GA
  • Application.Current.RequestedThemeChanged event only raises once #15350
  • [Android] Shadow not working properly with clipping #14786
  • ListView IsVisible Strange Behavior #13095
    Backlog
  • Shell ToolbarItems not shown in iOS App #14802
  • ScrollView not working when inside a VerticalStackLayout #14209
    Backlog
  • Navigation stops working #13695
    Backlog
  • Unable to load the package dependencies in Xamarin forms and MAUI #16515
  • RelativeLayout crashes android app. #12748
    Backlog
  • When I use MVVN binding a property , and use a thread to update this property value. This property value has been changed in the code,but in UI not changed! #16465
  • TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #9045
  • [Android and Windows] Setting the BoxView BackgroundColor is not working #12209
    .NET 8
  • Items in CollectionView overlaying each other on Windows #12118
    Backlog
  • CollectionView items are overlapping when loaded on Windows #8179
  • Support for Proxy in HttpClient in iOS #15179
  • Rare error occuring in the wild #16184

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix single taps #16561
  • Add swipe gesture for uitests #16560
  • Use same type converter for Brush as for Color to enable XAML completion #16559
  • Add doc comments for common types used in templates, maps, webview #16552
    area/docs 📓, t/docs 📝
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16536
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Add `dotnet-local` scripts to make using in tree dotnet easier. #16461
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add <inheritdoc /> XML docs for explicit interface implementations in BlazorWebView #16535
    area/docs 📓, area/blazor 🕸️, t/docs 📝
  • [tests] Fix run Compatibility on iOS #16549
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SwipeView #16532
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • Revert "[Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing (#14861)" #16541
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 branch #16527
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
  • Allow "duplicate" files to be processed #16534
    area/single project ☝️
  • Locate MAUI View for PlatformView #16463
    area/architecture
  • Setting binding on Label doesn't set text to incoming binding #16410
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Implement Additional PointerGestureRecognizer Platform Arguments #16426
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [uitests] Add UITests for RefreshView #16528
    area/testing
  • Use correct clip path method for RoundRectangle #16132
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #16474
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [X] avoid AmbiguousMatchException #15873
    area/Xaml </>
  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
